title: Birthright
description: Another gem from the treasure chest of a USA Today author.Set in a medieval world where survival of the fittest is a stark reality, two heroes with unique differences must deal with a gripping secret. Cruelly ridiculed as a deaf giant and an undesirable dwarf, Adam de Montbryce and his half-brother, Denis de Sancerre have forged an unbreakable bond in a ruthless world that scorns their physical impairments.Beauty Seen by Open HeartsTwo shunned sisters locked away in shame by their evil mother discover that true love is possible when a twist of fate demands a special kind of chivalrous rescue. Can misunderstood outcasts learn to trust Destiny when true love is at stake?
author: Anna Markland
